author: aliás..
text: I who dreamed that twitter adopted a 'priority tool' for our timeline, where we could classify each profile we follow (their degree of importance), using cute, funny and/or naughty emojis. BUT we could see what we were to each other 👀 aloôo @elonmusk

author: aliás..
text: as a person who's been dreaming and having nightmares about the ocean, today I woke up certain that the reason we left the ocean was its dangers.. but after reading this essay, i am almost convinced that going back there might be the right thing to do, as the memes say https://t.co/cGs6QfZIRL
